data.name: 0000 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Kyon, you're late! It's your treat again today, got it?

data.name: 0001 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The sun was beating down and the scorching asphalt burned underfoot.

data.name: 0002 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was just like being in a microwave and getting roasted from above and below.

data.name: 0003 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With my life half at risk, I arrived at the café in front of the station.

data.name: 0004 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi Suzumiya opened her mouth and pierc- ed me with words harsher than the summer sun.

data.name: 0005 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You've been slacking off since we last met haven't you?

data.name: 0006 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Since we last met? Didn't we talk just a few days ago?

data.name: 0007 (359.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: It's been a while, Kyon. Have you been doing well?

data.name: 0008 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah, I've been great.

data.name: 0009 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You seem to be no different to normal either, Asahina.

data.name: 0010 (359.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: Hehehe. That's not true! Like, I'm a little bit tanned and stuff.

data.name: 0011 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: To my eyes, she seemed to have the same clear white skin as ever.

data.name: 0012 (359.ja) MIKURU (朝比奈)
data.value: A-And, I finished all my homework with Tsuruya.

data.name: 0013 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Homework… huh?

data.name: 0014 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now that I think about it, I've barely touched it.

data.name: 0015 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, there's always the last week of summer vacation to finish them off--

data.name: 0016 (359.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Healthy?

data.name: 0017 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato… Y-Yeah.

data.name: 0018 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm glad to hear your voice, but that wasn't very conductive to conversation, Nagato.

data.name: 0019 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, what have you been up to recently?

data.name: 0020 (359.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Nothing special.

data.name: 0021 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well, no matter how much you say nothing there's always something isn't there?

data.name: 0022 (359.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: ……Reading.

data.name: 0023 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I see. That was my bad.

data.name: 0024 (359.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Everyone is acting the same as usual, aren't they?

data.name: 0025 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The same goes for you Koizumi. Your refreshing smile is wasted on me.

data.name: 0026 (359.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I've been looking foward to this.

data.name: 0027 (359.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Even though it's merely been a few days, I feel somewhat nostalgic.

data.name: 0028 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'm not particularly nostalgic or anything.

data.name: 0029 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: More importantly, don't get too close when its this cramped and sweltering already.

data.name: 0030 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Now that we're all here, let's start the SOS Brigade Debriefing right away.

data.name: 0031 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Debriefing?

data.name: 0032 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You went on a family trip, right?

data.name: 0033 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Did you have any interesting experiences while traveling?

data.name: 0034 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I want a full report of everything.

data.name: 0035 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It wasn't exactly a trip but……

data.name: 0036 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There wasn't anything particularly interesting.

data.name: 0037 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I cant speak for the other 3 though.

data.name: 0038 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You mean you didn't dragged into a hot springs murder mystery?

data.name: 0039 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No.

data.name: 0040 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Did you witness a terrifying ritual in a mountain village and get chased by monsters?

data.name: 0041 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There's no way that would happen.

data.name: 0042 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're still having the same boring summer vacation as always, huh.

data.name: 0043 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's why you're still the most boring member!

data.name: 0044 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You really need to broaden your horizons.

data.name: 0045 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's none of your business.

data.name: 0046 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: For the first time in a few days, the SOS Brigade had gathered in the usual café…

data.name: 0047 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was at that moment I got a call on my phone.

data.name: 0048 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Surely, that was what gave rise to this whole situation…

data.name: 0049 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Although at that time, nobody could've predicted it.

data.name: 0050 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ahh, sorry. It's my phone.

data.name: 0051 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hey! Kyon! We're in the middle of an important meeting!

data.name: 0052 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's why I said sorry… Yeah, hello?

data.name: 0053 (359.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: Hey Kyon, it's me!

data.name: 0054 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Oh, Taniguchi huh… I'm hanging up, ok?

data.name: 0055 (359.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: O-Oi! Don't hang up!

data.name: 0056 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Unfortunately, there's someone right before my eyes, scowling at me as if they're threatening to curse me.

data.name: 0057 (359.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: Whatever, just hear me out.

data.name: 0058 (359.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: You and your next door…neighbors? No, maybe it's two doors over?

data.name: 0059 (359.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: Well anyway, the point is it happened near the Computer Lab's neighborhood I guess.

data.name: 0060 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah, something happened.

data.name: 0061 (359.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: Apparently those guys made a fuss about encountering unnatural phenomena at school.

data.name: 0062 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Unnatural phenomena?

data.name: 0063 (359.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why again are you calling me about this?

data.name: 0064 (359.ja) TANIGUCHI (谷口)
data.value: Eh? You like that stuff don't you, you guys?

data.name: 0065 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No, I don't like it at all. If anything……

data.name: 0066 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Unnatural phenomena…… Hey, just now Kyon, that's for sure what you said wasn't it?

data.name: 0067 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Uu……Darn it……You were listened after all……

data.name: 0068 (359.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Unnatural phenomena! That's a subject we cant pass up! Tell me all the details!

data.name: 0069 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I may have grown complacent because it's been a while since the last major incident.

data.name: 0070 (359.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: In any case, I would eventually come to fiercely regret that foolish slip of the tongue.

data.name: 0071 (359.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
